insert into recharge_logs (aid, company_code, buid, summary, recharge_amount, after_balance, insert_time) values (#{aid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{companyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{buid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{summary,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{rechargeAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{afterBalance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{insertTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update recharge_logs set aid = #{aid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, company_code = #{companyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, buid = #{buid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, summary = #{summary,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, recharge_amount = #{rechargeAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, after_balance = #{afterBalance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, insert_time = #{insertTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, aid, company_code, buid, summary, recharge_amount, after_balance, insert_time from recharge_logs
